actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT
	"itemId" AS value,
	CASE
		WHEN "itemId" = 1 THEN 'FRP bonnet A'
		WHEN "itemId" = 2 THEN 'FRP bonnet B'
		WHEN "itemId" = 3 THEN 'FRP bonnet C'
		WHEN "itemId" = 4 THEN 'Carbon bonnet (Original Style)'
		WHEN "itemId" = 5 THEN 'Carbon bonnet A'
		WHEN "itemId" = 6 THEN 'Carbon bonnet B'
		WHEN "itemId" = 7 THEN 'Carbon bonnet C'
		WHEN "itemId" = 8 THEN 'FRP bonnet D'
		ELSE '未知引擎盖，请向管理员报告此错误'
	END AS label
FROM public."CarItem"
WHERE "carId" = {{SelectCarId.selectedOptionValue}} AND "category" = 4
UNION

SELECT
    0 AS value,
    '原厂引擎盖' AS label
ORDER BY value ASC;
SELECT pg_sleep(3);
